FuncDef:
The set compatible mode command configures the DCN compatible mode on a GNE.
The undo set compatible mode command restores the default configuration.
This command varies in transport and router modes. For detailed differences, see Differences Between Commands in Transport and Router Modes. This topic describes the command configuration in router mode.
By default, the DCN compatible mode is enabled in transport mode. and DCN compatible mode is disabled in router mode.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
DCN communication can be implemented between Huawei devices and NMSs through Telnet, but not between Huawei devices and RTNs. RTNs use microwave links for service transmission, and no cables are required, which reduces network deployment cost.
After the DCN compatible mode is configured on a GNE using the set compatible mode command, the GNE can manage RTNs, which reduces network deployment cost.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
The Qx encryption passwords on the NMS and the device must be the same.
Run the set compatible mode command to enable the DCN compatible mode
